Title: Exempts the costs associated with the construction of community college capital facilities from the real property tax levy limit for local governments
Summary: Exempts the costs associated with the construction of community college capital facilities from the real property tax levy limit for local governments.
LawCode: Amd ยง3-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to exempting the costs associated with the construction of community college capital facilities from the real property tax levy limit for local governments
